VxPermissionAuthorityChecker - Interface in me.vectorx.spring.security.authority.permission

VxPermissionAuthorityCheckerExecutor - Interface in me.vectorx.spring.security.authority.permission
PermissionAuthorityChecker를 실행해주는 interface 정의 ${AllGrantedPermissionAuthorityCheckerExecutor} : 등록된 PermissionAuthorityChecker가 모두 성공 Pass ${OneGrantedPermissionAuthorityCheckerExecutor} : 등록된 PermissionAuthorityChecker중 하나이상 성공 Pass
